snippet.title: Hazing - Night Shift (Official Trailer 2024)
snippet.description:
Psychological horror "Hazing - Night Shift" tells the short and very creepy story of a police officer named Stanley. It was his first night on duty.

Add the game to your wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2968170/Hazing__Night_Shift

A very alarming call was received to the rescue service. The woman cried hysterically and called for help. Then her voice stopped. There were beeps on the phone.

Everything you will see in this game is real events from the scene. Are you brave enough to watch this film to the end?

Game Features:
1. Found-footage horror.
2. VHS filter immerses you in the atmosphere even more
3. Realistic graphics
4. Very scary sounds
5. No artificial screamers. Only what can scare you in reality.
6. A short horror story that will stay in your memory forever.

My Inst: https://www.instagram.com/revvalution_studio
My X: https://twitter.com/Revvalution_St
